questiontext.text:
The angular position, $$\theta$$, of an orbiting object can be described by:

$$\theta=-3.t^3+4.t^2$$

Where $$t$$ is time in seconds.

What is the angular acceleration at $$t$$ =  10 s.


Give your answer in rad/s2, to the nearest whole number.

{1:NUMERICAL:=-172:0.5#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}

(Question ID #1).

generalfeedback.text:
By differentiating with respect to time, and substituting in $$t$$ =  10 s:

Angular velocity $$=\omega=\frac{d\theta }{dt}=(3\times-3\times t^2)+(2\times4\times t)=-820$$ rad/s.

Angular acceleration $$=\alpha=\frac{d\omega }{dt}=(2\times-9\times t)+8=-172$$ rad/s2.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Image adapted from 'http://images.tutorvista.com/cms/formulaimages/83/formula-for-angular-accelerations.PNG'

hint.text:
HINT

Use your knowledge that angular velocity is the differential of angular displacement with respect to time, and that angular acceleration is the differential of angular velocity with respect to time, to answer this question.

Use your knowledge that angular velocity is the differential of angular displacement with respect to time, and that angular acceleration is the differential of angular velocity with respect to time, to answer this question.

questiontext.text:
The angular position, $$\theta$$, of an orbiting object can be described by:

$$\theta=-8.t^3+6.t^2$$

Where $$t$$ is time in seconds.

What is the angular acceleration at $$t$$ =  5 s.


Give your answer in rad/s2, to the nearest whole number.

{1:NUMERICAL:=-228:0.5#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}

(Question ID #52).

generalfeedback.text:
By differentiating with respect to time, and substituting in $$t$$ =  5 s:

Angular velocity $$=\omega=\frac{d\theta }{dt}=(3\times-8\times t^2)+(2\times6\times t)=-540$$ rad/s.

Angular acceleration $$=\alpha=\frac{d\omega }{dt}=(2\times-24\times t)+12=-228$$ rad/s2.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
